description.general: A nimble hunter of wildlife. The Sea People use it to harvest hides and meat effectively.
A fast-hitting rammer favored by the Rempah, built to Flood enemy hulls before vanishing into the waves.
A fortress on the water, with formidable defenses and recovery, as befitting the technological might of the megacorporations.
A ship capable of sustained repairs at sea. Prized by smugglers to swiftly repair themselves whilst evading enemy fire.
A firestorm at sea. Repurposed in the Ungwana dockyards, it excels at setting enemy fleets Ablaze and crippling burning foes.
A fast menace specializing in explosive weaponry. Prized by pirates for making short work of enemy convoys and structures.
A floating siege engine, obliterating structures and striking harder when Anchored. Once used by warlords to shatter the walls of an ancient kingdom.
Initially a Dutch warship built to escort valuable trade convoys. Its fast recovery of Brace Strength allows it to hold the line against overwhelming firepower.
A ramming predator that excels at dealing Flooding Damage before the final blow. Feared by the megacorporations and merchants alike.
A pyromaniac of a ship rumored to hail from the Arabian subcontinent. Sets nearby enemies Ablaze, before spreading flames to all who dare come close.
The backbone of any fleet, repairing hulls and reinforcing allies in the heat of battle. The pride of a Compagnie convoy.
A master of auxiliary warfare, amplifying support weapons for both offense and defense, as befitting the British Trade Alliance.
A walking provocation and exotic vessel from the Far East -- taunting enemies and soaking up fire, before turning the tide for friends.
Devastates enemies from afar while equipped with the ability to escape whenever a fight gets too close. Modeled after an ancient god of the skies.
Ein Meister verheerender Breitseitenangriffe. Verwandelt jedes Sperrfeuer in eine explosive Reaktion und richtet auf der Roten Insel verheerende Schäden an Flotten und Gebäuden an.
Ein großes Schiff mit unvergleichlicher Verteidigung. Es verströmt eine mächtige Aura, die Verbündete stärkt. Ein Produkt des Einfallsreichtums der Compagnie und verbesserter Materialien aus Europa.
Ein Schiff, das besonders gut darin ist, Giftstoffe zu verbreiten. Manche sagen, dass der Seuchenkönig selbst auf seine Segel haucht und so in seinem Kielwasser die Pest verbreitet.
